import Button from "./UI/button/Button" export default function Buttons({ setProcess, a, setA, s, setS, b, setB, dispatch }) { function handleCalculation(e) { setProcess('calculation') if (!a) setA(e.target.value) if (!s && a) setS(e.target.value) if (s) setB(e.target.value) } function handleCleaning() { setProcess('nothing') setA('') setS('') setB('') } return (
) }
